post.text: There is absolutely NO DOUBT that Crooked Hillary is a PATHOLOGICAL LIAR. Even the liberal media is calling her out! She's a security risk and admits she "short circuited" -- UNBELIEVABLE! There is no question she is COMPLETELY UNQUALIFIED to be President. #MakeAmericaGreatAgain

comment.author: Corey
comment.text: If you honestly think Trump isn't crooked and wouldn't be a risk to our national security then I'll just chalk it up that you are just another moron! And I'm not saying I'm a Clinton supporter either.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: The real issue at stake is preserving American capitalism, free enterprise and the constitution vs. un-American socialism. All this BS about who lies, who's corrupt or who's a greater risk is just a distrsction from what matters most.

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: Actually, if you want to talk about the real issues you have to go much deeper than you are willing to admit. Our monetary system, the very basis on which our form of Capitalism is built upon, is flawed and non-sustainable. Furthermore, Capitalism fuels waste... in a time when our resources are rapidly running out. We will be known as the moronic generations that were more concerned with greed and personal gain than with the future of our planet and species.

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Hey joe. You can chalk me up as one of those morons too. I am not, however, a big enough moron to back anyone in the Democratic Party, or to vote for any of them big you think this country would be safer or better off with hillary, you are obviously the moron here. Lmao.

replies.author: Corey
replies.text: Nicole Did you even read my entire statement? You are only proving my point here.

replies.author: Bryce
replies.text: We can speculate all kinds of things about trump but there is nothing to convict him. however, everyone knows that Hillary is all evilness!
